original_text: Now Joseph had been brought down to Egypt, and Potiphar, an officer of Pharaoh, the captain of the guard, an Egyptian, had bought him from the Ishmaelites who had brought him down there.
korean_text: 요셉이 이끌려 애굽에 내려가매 바로의 신하 친위대장 애굽 사람 보디발이 그를 그리로 데려간 이스마엘 사람의 손에서 요셉을 사니라

sentences.original_text: Now Joseph had been brought down to Egypt
and Potiphar, an officer of Pharaoh
the captain of the guard, an Egyptian
had bought him from the Ishmaelites
who had brought him down there
